meanings.definition: A person who does not eat meat.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a vegetarian and only eats vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The vegetarian at the party brought a delicious salad.
meanings.sent3: The vegetarian joked that they would rather eat grass than meat.
meanings.sent4: Her commitment to being a vegetarian is as strong as steel.
meanings.sent5: The vegetarian's dedication to their diet is truly admirable.

meanings.definition: A dish consisting solely of vegetables or fruits.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant offers a variety of vegetarian options on their menu.
meanings.sent2: I love making vegetarian stir-fry with colorful veggies.
meanings.sent3: The vegetarian dish looked so good that even the meat lovers were tempted.
meanings.sent4: Her garden salad was a vibrant vegetarian masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The vegetarian platter was a feast for the eyes as well as the stomach.
